content: capybara-bara my crochet capybara coaster pattern is a perfect way to accessorize your morning cup of coffee the capybara with oranges on its head is sure to bring a smile to anyone s face **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - brown ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - jute ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - black ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - orange ▢4 5mm crochet hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet triple crochet - treble_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase
